name: Once, Daily
description:
A cute puzzle game. Early build made for Scream Jam 2019. Made under 3 days because I decided to actually join the jam late.  Some features I wanted to add didn't make the cut in time, such as sound and a proper menu. These will be added in a future update.

Graphics were created with MagicaVoxel. Game made in Unity.

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • Spacebar: View Items
  • Left Click (Mouse): Interact
